title: Development of Sustainable Language Education Solutions Through Co-Design

context.additional_context: Learners are intermediate adult language learners from diverse cultural backgrounds, familiar with digital devices but lacking systematic instructional design experience. The classroom is equipped with wireless infrastructure supporting a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more sustainable language learning activities through a collaborative design process.
Learners can identify problems that may occur in real educational contexts and propose improvement plans based on stakeholder feedback.
Learners can develop prototypes of language education solutions that consider ethical and cultural contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
